metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a super fun weekend! We've found some amazing places where you can see trains, diggers, and even DINOSAURS! Let's go explore!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure
activities.description: Explore London's biggest urban farm with llamas, cows, and more! Perfect for a full day of animal fun and running around.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's got animals galore and you can ride the DLR to get there - sit at the front to pretend you're driving!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then DLR to Mudchute. 45 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for amazing views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Visit
activities.description: A lovely local farm with pigs, goats, donkeys, and chickens. Perfect for a quick trip to see some animals and grab a snack at the cafe.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see real farm animals up close, just like on Peppa Pig!

transport.fromHackney: Walk or take the 394/26 bus. 10 mins

activities.title: Olympic Park Playground Fun
activities.description: Massive playgrounds, including Tumbling Bay with sand and water, perfect for a day of outdoor play. In warmer weather, check out the Pleasure Garden splash area!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Huge playgrounds to climb and run around in, just like in Hey Duggee!

transport.tip: Pack a change of clothes for the water play!

activities.title: Victoria Park Adventure
activities.description: Two great playgrounds, a boating lake, and a deer enclosure. Perfect for a picnic and a run around.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see real deer and play on the slides and swings!

transport.fromHackney: Walk, cycle, or take the Homerton Overground. 10 mins
transport.tube: Mile End tube is close by
transport.tip: Bring bread to feed the ducks (but not too much)!

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Under 5s play area and design workshops. A great indoor option for creative play.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Hands-on activities and a dedicated play area just for little ones!

transport.tip: Check out the design workshops for extra fun!

activities.title: Spitalfields City Farm
activities.description: A small but friendly city farm with donkeys and other farm animals.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Donkeys! And it's a quick trip to see them.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street. 20 mins
transport.tip: Check out the farm shop for local produce.

activities.title: Dinosaur Adventure at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: See a HUGE T-Rex skeleton and learn all about dinosaurs! Don't miss the Blue Whale too!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's got a T-Rex and other dinosaurs, just like in your favourite dinosaur books!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Liverpool Street, then tube (Circle/District/Central) to South Kensington. 45 mins
transport.tip: Follow the tunnel from the tube station to avoid the crowds outside.

activities.title: London Transport Museum Exploration
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, play in the All Aboard zone, and try the tube simulator! Under 18s are free with a paying adult.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can climb on REAL buses and trains, just like you love to do!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Liverpool Street, then tube (Central) to Covent Garden. 40 mins
transport.tip: Check out the stamper trail for extra fun!

activities.title: RAF Museum Flight Adventure
activities.description: See real airplanes and helicopters up close in huge hangers! There's also a playground for outdoor fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see real airplanes and helicopters, just like in your books!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Finsbury Park, then tube (Piccadilly) to Colindale. 50 mins
transport.tip: Check out the 4D cinema for an immersive experience.

activities.title: Thames Clipper Boat Trip to Greenwich
activities.description: Take a boat trip down the Thames to Greenwich! Sit outside at the back for the best views.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's a real boat ride on the river!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Tower Gateway. 30 mins
transport.tip: Sit outside at the back for the best views!

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs
activities.description: See Victorian dinosaur statues on islands! There's also a farm, maze, and great playground.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Canada Water, then Overground to Crystal Palace. 1 hour
transport.tip: Explore the maze after seeing the dinosaurs!

activities.title: Science Museum's The Garden
activities.description: The Garden is a dedicated area for under 5s to explore science through play. Plus, check out the Making the Modern World gallery for TRAINS!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: The Garden is perfect for little hands to play and learn, and there are real TRAINS to see!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Liverpool Street, then tube (Circle/District/Central) to South Kensington. 45 mins
transport.tip: Visit early to avoid the crowds in The Garden.

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live
activities.description: See Hey Duggee and the Squirrels live on stage! Earn badges and sing along to your favourite songs.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Hey Duggee, live! You can earn badges just like Duggee!

transport.tip: Book tickets in advance as it's a popular show!

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: See life-size dinosaur puppets on stage! A thrilling and educational experience.

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs can be a little scary for very young children, but it's mostly fun!

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance along with Peppa Pig and her friends in this fun live show.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Peppa Pig and all her friends, live on stage!

transport.tip: Get ready to sing and dance along!

activities.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
activities.description: See the classic story of The Tiger Who Came to Tea come to life on stage.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's a fun and colourful show based on a favourite book!

transport.tip: Perfect for a first theatre experience.

activities.title: Polka Theatre Adventure Playground
activities.description: Dedicated kids theatre with a FREE adventure playground outside. Book tickets for a show or just enjoy the playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A fun playground and maybe even a show to watch!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Waterloo, then train to Wimbledon. 1hr 15mins
transport.tip: Check the website for show listings and times.

activities.title: Hackney Empire Shows
activities.description: Check the listings for kids' shows at this beautiful local theatre.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Local theatre with lots of different things to see!

transport.tip: Check the website for show listings and times.

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: See Bluey and Bingo live on stage in this interactive show.

transport.tip: Book tickets in advance as it's a popular show!
